import React, { useRef } from "react"; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; import "./contact.css"; const Contact = () => { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm( "service_x1hewh5", "template_2ki8hlo", form.current, "vxDcl4UI2jbOQBn6f" ); e.target.reset(); }; return (
